## Button macro rendering.macro.button.name=Button Macro rendering.macro.button.description=Insert a noticeable, clickable button on your XWiki page to highlight links and create call to actions! rendering.macro.button.parameter.label.name=Label rendering.macro.button.parameter.label.description=The label of the button. rendering.macro.button.parameter.url.name=URL rendering.macro.button.parameter.url.description=A link or a page reference. rendering.macro.button.parameter.color.name=Color rendering.macro.button.parameter.color.description=The color of the button. rendering.macro.button.parameter.width.name=Width rendering.macro.button.parameter.width.description=The width of the button specified in pixels, percentage or other valid CSS value (ex. 30px, 30%, 30em). If no value is specified, the width will be determined by the length of the label. rendering.macro.button.parameter.newTab.name=Open in new tab rendering.macro.button.parameter.newTab.description=Denotes whether the page will be opened in a new page or not. rendering.macro.button.parameter.icon.name=Icon rendering.macro.button.parameter.icon.description=Icon associated with the button, placed before the label.
## Panel macro rendering.macro.panel.name=Panel Macro rendering.macro.panel.description=Panel macro to display XWiki content inside a panel. rendering.macro.panel.content.description=Add the Panel content. It supports XWiki 2.1 syntax. rendering.macro.panel.parameter.title.name=Title rendering.macro.panel.parameter.title.description=The title of the panel. If specified, this title will be displayed in its own title row. rendering.macro.panel.parameter.titleColor.name=Title Text Color rendering.macro.panel.parameter.titleColor.description=The color of the text in the title row of the panel. Colors can be specified as HTML color names or hexadecimal codes. rendering.macro.panel.parameter.titleBGColor.name=Title background color rendering.macro.panel.parameter.titleBGColor.description=The background color of the title row of the panel. Colors can be specified as HTML color names or hexadecimal codes. rendering.macro.panel.parameter.bgColor.name=Background color rendering.macro.panel.parameter.bgColor.description=If specified, sets the background color of the content of the panel. Colors can be specified as HTML color names or hexadecimal codes. rendering.macro.panel.parameter.contentTextColor.name=Content text color rendering.macro.panel.parameter.contentTextColor.description=If specified, sets the text color of the content of the panel. Colors can be specified as HTML color names or hexadecimal codes. rendering.macro.panel.parameter.borderStyle.name=Border style rendering.macro.panel.parameter.borderStyle.description=The style of the panel's border. Accepted values are solid, dashed and other valid CSS border styles. rendering.macro.panel.parameter.borderColor.name=Border color rendering.macro.panel.parameter.borderColor.description=The color of the panel's border. Colors can be specified as HTML color names or hexadecimal codes. rendering.macro.panel.parameter.borderWidth.name=Border width rendering.macro.panel.parameter.borderWidth.description=The width of the panel's border expressed in pixels. Only values are accepted (e.g: 1) rendering.macro.panel.parameter.borderRadius.name=Border radius rendering.macro.panel.parameter.borderRadius.description=If specified, replaces the default border radius rendering.macro.panel.parameter.width.name=Width rendering.macro.panel.parameter.width.description=If specified, sets the width of the panel (300px or 50%). rendering.macro.panel.parameter.classes.name=CSS classes rendering.macro.panel.parameter.classes.description= If specified adds css classes to the panel.
## Status macro rendering.macro.status.name=Status rendering.macro.status.description=Insert a colored label in the text to highlight the status of an item. rendering.macro.status.parameter.colour.name=Color rendering.macro.status.parameter.colour.description=The color of the status(text color and background color). The following colors are available: "Blue", "Green", "Grey", "Purple", "Red" and "Yellow". Default: "Grey". rendering.macro.status.parameter.title.name=Title rendering.macro.status.parameter.title.description=The text of the status. If not specified, the color name will be displayed (e.g.:"Grey"). rendering.macro.status.parameter.subtle.name=Subtle rendering.macro.status.parameter.subtle.description=The aspect of the status: either white text on dark color background or dark color text on light color background. This is a boolean parameter so it should be filled with "true" or "false". Default: "false" (white text on dark color background).
